Escape Shared Hosting and Take Control with a VPS

Take control of the way you run your hosting space with our affordable Virtual Private Server (VPS) or Virtual Dedicated Server (VDS) solution. VPS is perfect for the small to medium sized businesses, web designers, or web host resellers. With our first-class connectivity and knowledgeable support staff we can have your VPS setup the way you want it. Each of our VPS comes with cPanel/WHM with Fantastico, ClientExec billing software and Virtuozzo Power Panel.

Starter VPS Plan - $39.95/month

:. 6 GB Disk Space
:. 120 GB Monthly Transfer Limit
:. 99% Uptime Guarantee
:. 24/7 Customer Service
:. 128 MB Minimum RAM
:. 2 GB Maximum RAM
:. cPanel/WHM
:. Fantastico DeLuxe
:. ClientExec Billing Software
:. Virtuozzo Power Panel
:. Unmetered Domains
:. 2 Unique IP's
:. Personalized Name Servers
:. Shared SSL Server
:. $0 Setup Fee
:. Month-to-Month Contract

To read more about this package or to purchase go to:

Starter VPS Package
